title: Projects
subtitle: Manage your projects and track their progress

empty.title: No projects yet
empty.description: Get started by creating your first project.

linkDialog.title: Link Project to Remote Project
linkDialog.description: Link this local project to a remote project for collaboration and syncing.
linkDialog.noOrganizations: No organizations available. Create an organization first.

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: You need to be logged in to link projects.

linkDialog.noRemoteProjects: No remote projects found in this organization. Try creating a new one instead.

linkedToOrganizationTooltip: This project is linked to a remote project for collaboration

linkToLocalFolderDialog.title: Link to Local Folder
linkToLocalFolderDialog.description: Create a local project from a git repository and link it to this remote project.
linkToLocalFolderDialog.localFolderHelp: Select an existing git repository folder on this machine.
linkToLocalFolderDialog.projectNamePlaceholder: Leave empty to use folder name
linkToLocalFolderDialog.projectNameHelp: Override the project name, or leave empty to use the folder name.
linkToLocalFolderDialog.selectFolderDescription: Choose a git repository to link to this remote project

errors.selectFolder: Please select a local git repository folder
errors.linkFailed: Failed to link to local folder

fromGitRepo.title: From Git Repository
fromGitRepo.description: Use an existing repository as your project base

cloneFromUrl.title: Clone from URL
cloneFromUrl.description: Clone a repository from GitHub, GitLab, or any Git URL
cloneFromUrl.repositoryUrlHelp: Supports GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and SSH URLs
cloneFromUrl.cloneToDirectoryHelp: Leave empty to clone to your current working directory
cloneFromUrl.cloningDescription: This may take a moment depending on the repository size

createBlank.title: Create Blank Project
createBlank.description: Start a new project from scratch
createBlank.projectNameHelp: The folder name will be auto-generated from the project name
createBlank.parentDirectoryHelp: Leave empty to use your current working directory, or specify a custom path.

selectRepo.searchAllReposDescription: Browse and select any repository on your system

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.description: Enable to display issue and PR counts for this project
github.enabledDescription: Display issue and PR counts in the project header
